text:
Florence Pugh Wows in Valentino at 'The Wonder' Premiere in London! (Photos) Florence Pugh continues to give us wow moments on the red carpet!

The 26-year-old actress looked beautiful while walking the carpet for the 2022 BFI London Film Festival premiere of her movie The Wonder on Friday evening (October 7) at the Royal Festival Hall in London, England.

Florence was joined at the event by co-stars Niamh Algar, Toby Jones, Elaine Cassidy, and Kila Lord Cassidy, as well as director Sebastian Lelio.

The Wonder will hit theaters on November 2, and will be available to stre Read more

NBC Announces 'America's Got Talent: All Stars' Season - Judges & Host Revealed! NBC has announced a new edition of America’s Got Talent!

The network will be airing a new spinoff called America’s Got Talent: All-Stars, which will “feature winners, finalists, fan favorites, and viral sensations from previous seasons of the mothership series and Got Talent franchises around the world,” according to Deadline.

NBC previously aired two seasons of America’s Got Talent: The Champions back in 2019 and 2020 and this sounds like it will be a similar vers Read more

Eva Mendes Clears Up False Reports About Her Acting Career, Reveals Her 'Dream Project' Eva Mendes would like to make one thing clear – she did not quit acting.Reports broke last month that the 48-year-old star quit the business due to a lack of roles available. She has since focused on other things such as her sponge business Skura Style and her family with Ryan Gosling.However, the narrative that she “quit” Hollywood doesn’t check out, and she is explaining why. She also revealed what her “dream project” has been.Click inside to check out what Read more

Ben Affleck & Jennifer Garner Seen Going Separate Ways After a School Visit Together Former couple Ben Affleck and Jennifer Garner started their day together on Friday.

The 50-year-old Oscar-winning filmmaker and actor and the 50-year-old actress were spotted leaving their son Samuel‘s school and heading their separate ways on Friday morning (October 7) in Los Angeles.

It’s Halloween season and Jennifer is clearly getting ready for the big day. She took to her Instagram account to share a compilation of some of her former costumes while poking fun at herself for nev Read more

Dwayne Johnson Reveals Whether He's Going to Run for President Dwayne Johnson is addressing his political aspirations.

The 50-year-old former wrestler and actor spoke out about whether he’d run for the office of President of the United States one day during an interview with CBS Sunday Morning, airing this weekend.

He expressed interest in running for president as early as 2017, and last year met with people in politics to conduct “a small amount of research and analysis to see” what a presidential run in the future could look like, via V Read more

Joni Mitchell Is Not Dead; Rep Responds After False Report Joni Mitchell is alive and well.

A false death report spread on the internet on Friday morning (October 7) after People magazine accidentally posted an obituary that appears to have been pre-written.

Joni‘s rep spoke out to confirm she is doing well amid the erroneous report, which scared fans into thinking that she might have actually died.

Click inside to read more…

“I can confirm all is well so this was done in error,” Joni‘s rep told Variety.

People‘s ar Read more

Sharon Osbourne Blasts Black Lives Matter Organization, Seemingly Throws Support Behind Kanye West Kanye West is receiving support from an unexpected source amid the controversy that brewed up after he wore a White Lives Matter shirt during a recent appearance – Sharon Osbourne.The 45-year-old provocateur followed things up by making an appearance on Fox’s Tucker Carlson Tonight where he spoke to host Tucker Carlson about a variety of topics. He has received support from a handful of celebrities, with Sharon being the latest to weigh in on the situation.Sharon‘s support see Read more

Dua Lipa Addresses Her Relationship Status Amid Trevor Noah Romance Rumors Dua Lipa is setting the record straight on her romantic life.

The 27-year-old “Don’t Start Now” singer opened up about her love life during the latest episode of her Dua Lipa: At Your Service podcast on Friday (October 7), which featured guest star Charli XCX.

During their conversation, Dua opened up about dating, following recent headlines and speculation after she was spotted having a night out with The Daily Show‘s Trevor Noah.

Find out what she said… Read more

Draymond Green Violently Punches Jordan Poole in Shocking Practice Footage Video Draymond Green attacked Jordan Poole during practice, and it was all caught on camera.

The 32-year-old Golden State Warriors player was seen viciously punching his 23-year-old teammate, knocking him to the ground during team practice.

In footage obtained by TMZ, the teammates can be seen trash-talking at each other, with the argument eventually turning physical.

Click inside to read more…

Draymond is captured walking up to Jordan, and as he pushes Draymond away with two hands to the ches Read more

James McAvoy Debuts 'His Dark Materials' Season 3 Trailer - Watch Now! James McAvoy speaks on stage during the His Dark Materials interview at New York Comic Con 2022 on Thursday (October 6) in New York City.Here’s the season 3 synopsis: Based on “The Amber Spyglass,” the final novel in Philip Pullman’s award-winning trilogy, in the final chapter of this epic fantasy series, Lyra (Dafne Keen), the prophesied child, and Will (Amir Wilson), the bearer of The Subtle Knife, must journey to a dark place from which no one has ever returned.As her Read more

Alexandra Daddario Releases 'Mayfair Witches' Trailer - Watch Now! Alexandra Daddario sat down for a panel discussion on Mayfair Witches during New York Comic Con 2022 on Thursday (October 6) in New YorkCity.

The 36-year-old Baywatch actress was joined by co-stars Harry Hamlin, Jack Huston and Tongayi Chirisa.

Here’s a synopsis: Mayfair Witches is an exploration of female power and the mortal implications of our decisions.Mayfair Witches focuses on an intuitive young neurosurgeon (Daddario) who discovers that she is the unlikely heir to a family of witch Read more

Mindy Kaling & Constance Wu Discuss New 'Velma' Series Mindy Kaling and Constance Wu sat down at HBO Max’s Velma panel during New York Comic Con 2022 on Wednesday (October 6) in New York City.

The 43-year-old The Office actress is the executive producer and lead voice for Velma.

Here’s a synopsis of the series: “Velma is an adult animated comedy series telling the origin story of Velma Dinkley, the unsung and under appreciated brains of the Scooby-Doo Mystery Inc. gang. This original and humorous spin unmasks the complex and color Read more

Robert Downey Jr. & Wife Susan Support 'Decision to Leave' Premiere Robert Downey Jr. comes out for the Decision To Leave premiere at the Linwood Dunn Theater on Thursday (October 6) in Los Angeles, California.

The 57-year-old Avengers: Endgame actor and his wife, Susan Downey, supported the release of the South Korean romantic mystery film starring Tang Wei and Park Hae-il.

Click inside to read more…

The film focuses on a detective who falls for a mysterious widow after she becomes the prime suspect in his latest murder investigation.The film is co-writ Read more

Lindsay Lohan Sings 'Jingle Bell Rock' in 'Falling for Christmas' Trailer - Watch! Lindsay Lohan is providing a Mean Girls throwback with her new movie!

The 36-year-old actress premiered the highly anticipated trailer for her Netflix original Falling for Christmas on Friday (October 7), including a teaser of herself singing “Jingle Bell Rock,” as featured in her 2004 hit.

Click inside to read more…

“Christmas has come early and I come bearing gifts. I am thrilled to share the trailer for my new film, Falling for Christmas, only on Netflix November 10t Read more

Who Has Lana Del Rey Worked With? Every Collaboration Over the Years Lana Del Rey‘s extensive back catalog is full of collaborations.

Ever since rising to fame with Born To Die over a decade ago, the “Summertime Sadness” singer-songwriter has hopped in the studio with a ton of superstars in the past few years, resulting in some incredible collaborative work.

To celebrate the news of Lana‘s upcoming collaboration with Taylor Swift, “Snow on the Beach,” we’re taking a look back at all the times Lana Del Rey has worked with Read more
